lines.text: You fuck! It could be a pile of shit out of someone's asshole!
You bastard! You work for the Manhattan Corporation!

I work for nobody. I don't care about the Manhattan Corporation! I don't care about the girl, I don't care about politics, I don't care about anything! I believe in nothing. I'm Hammer - The Exterminator!
You're the biggest son of a bitch in the world. You're afraid somebody might remember you were born in the Bronx?
No, you're wrong. I'm gonna make sure that nobody ever forgets.
